  • Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    Handler for individual client connections to the notification server.
    MessageListenerThread
    Thread responsible for listening to messages from the notification server.
    NotificationClient
    Notification client that connects to the NotificationServer and receives FTP change notifications.
    NotificationClient.MessageListener
    Interface for handling received messages
    NotificationController
    Controller that coordinates FTP notifications between clients and manages table updates.
    NotificationServer
    Notification server that manages client connections and broadcasts FTP change notifications.
    ServerListenerThread
    Thread responsible for listening to incoming client connections on the notification server.
